name: CSH Multiscroll
author: Tony

sections.description:
CSH Multiscroll WordPress Plugin – Amazing slide.

Features

  • Multi scroll slide for multi pages
  • Responsive Expand
  • Support Shortcode in content
  • Unlimited customized Styles
  • Documented All our product come bundled with step by step documentation covering instalation and setup.
  • Translation Ready All our products are translation ready using Poedit tool with instructions in bundled documentation.
  • Regular Product Updates CSH Multiscroll Plugin is kept up to date with the latest WordPress versions
  • Customer Support Provided Mon – Fri through external support system at https://cmssuperheroes.com/ticket Support covers setup, product features, and bug fixes only.

And many interest features will be updated soon.
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq: How can I learn more about CSH Multiscroll? Visit our website at: http://demo.cmssuperheroes.com/csh-plugins/csh-multiscroll
